Side Effects: Horrific gout like symptoms in both feet and legs. I could not stand or walk plus exreme sleep disruption. Felt like I was loosing my mental balance.
Comments: I rarely take antibiotics and trust generally my bodies own internal processes. Consequently when I had this horrific reaction I stopped taking the medicine. After approximately 6 weeks my poor feet are not back to normal but are slowly getting better. Stay away from leviquin_ another bad one.

Side Effects: Horrific gout like symptoms in both feet and legs. I could not stand or walk plus exreme sleep disruption. Felt like I was loosing my mental balance.
Comments: I rarely take antibiotics and trust generally my bodies own internal processes. Consequently when I had this horrific reaction I stopped taking the medicine. After approximately 6 weeks my poor feet are not back to normal but are slowly getting better. Stay away from leviquin_ another bad one.

Side Effects: Nausea at firstStomach crampsBack painJoint painsConstipationInsomniaAnxiety heightenedFeeling like I've got no energy
Comments: Taking 375 three times a day for quite a bad UTI

Side Effects: Severe bilateral foot_ ankle and calf aching/burning/pain. Mild for the first couple of days_ increased in intensity quickly over the 6 days until unbearable. Brain fogginess.Stomach upset_ gas_ loose stools and constipation.
Comments: I have not taken the augmentin in over 48 hours and although my leg pain has alleviated to some degree within the first day_ it is still very much present and not diominishing further. I'm concerned that it may be permanent nerve damage of some sort. Burning_ aching and shooting pains continue.

Side Effects: DiarrheaMuscle painTendon painHeadacheHeart palpitations
Comments: This medication should be used only as a last resort based on the severity of its potential side effects.

Side Effects: I quit taking xanax for anxiety 2 yrs ago. That being said I haven't had any issues with anxiety ever since. Started taking augmentin and within days I started experiencing anxiety to the point that I could barely keep myself together. Mind racing_ complete loss of control of thoughts as well as strange thoughts. Very scary and I would not recommend this drug to anyone w/anxiety issues. Thankfully I decided to look it up and found this is one of the most severe. BEWARE OF THIS DRUG
Severe upper leg pain (both thighs). Wrist and hand pain (both hands). Constipation. Insomnia.
Comments: Within the first two or three days_ the muscles in the top part of both of my thighs started hurting continuously. From the knee to the groin. Very bad pain. Then both of my hands started tingling and hurting with a stinging pain (like having them thrust into a bucket of freezing water). If not for Ibuprofen_ I don't know what would have become of me_ it hurt that bad. And it was continuous. I also experienced severe constipation (which is totally unheard of for me). Plus my sleep cycle suddenly changed. I though that might be because of the unrelenting pain_ but now I'm not so sure. I stopped taking it one day shy of the two week mark my Doctor prescribed. That was two days ago. Now my leg pain is relenting somewhat. I hope it stops soon.

Side Effects: No side effects at all until about day 7 and I began to have a bump here and there on my waist line that would itch.
Comments: After I finished the meds_ the rash worsened. It was mainly a flat rash with a raised bump here and there that would itch. The rash spread up my sides_ to my mid and low back then my thighs. It was all gone within 10-14 days after finishing the antibiotic. I've taken Augmentin before with zero issues but this is the first XR I've taken.

Side Effects: Zero side effects.
Horrible stomach pain and bleeding and developed C diff now from it
Comments: Please don't take this.. I would never wish this on anyone..

Side Effects: I developed c.diff that nearly killed me from this antibiotic. I bled for weeks.... sometimes more than 15 times a day. Anxiety_ depression_ heart palpitations_ vomiting_ severe joint pain.. (unusable left arm with intense pain stil exist after two months). If you like Russian Roulette you will love this demonic antibiotic.
Comments: Think long and hard before considering this antibiotic. I almost died from taking it.

Side Effects: Extreme swelling in abdomen...I looked like I was 6 months pregnant. Also debilitating pain in stomach and right arm/elbow.
Comments: I also developed constant heartburn after taking this drug. Almost a year later and the heartburn still exists. GI system has not been right since taking this either.

Side Effects: Bloating_ nausea_ vomiting_ diarrhea_ skin itching_ vaginal pains_ upset stomach_ no appetite_ numbness and tingling in limbs_ joint pain_ abdominal pain_ vomiting and chest pains.
Comments: This is the worst medicine I've ever taken_ by day one I was vomiting then followed by severe diarrhea that lasted almost a week which now I have hemorrhoids from_ chest pain that felt like I was about to have a heart attack_ anxiety_ nervousness_ could barely eat food without feeling sick_ loss in appetite_ I feel like this had definitely cause me some GI issues. I called my doctor and she said to just finish out the Meds I have a day and a half left. I will never take this again_ I hope that I don't not suffer long term from this medication! I am not too keen of taking medication unless absolutely necessary_ it did clear my strep throat but I feel horrible I feel like I'm 62 rather than 26.

Side Effects: doctor injected 15 ML powder mixture in vein an almost fallen dead. omitting_ blackening of palms and soles. nails became blue. itching in hole body_ severe sweating hole bed got wet. not able to hear and judge. all things looking white. heart rate increases. insomnia. urination and body temperature almost went to zero. fallen down on floor for 15 minutes.
Comments: doctor immediately give water to drink and 2 anti allergic injection in vein saved my life. very dangerous drug. Please take test before usage. other with it can take away your life.

Side Effects: Muscle spasm and joint pain
Comments: Only 2 days into my 10 day course and I am having sharp shooting pains in my elbow and occasionally in both knees. Hoping it doesn't get any worse...

Side Effects: Within one use of the medication_ shortly after taking a pill I experienced: diarrhea_ vomitting_ itching all over body_ swelling_ heightened heart rate_ fever_ cold sweats_ pain in my chest_ stomach and abdominal area. Upon taking it once more recently_ only 1cc of it_ I have experienced itching_ vaginal irritation_ and reddened skin after not taking it for several months.
Anxious_ confusion_ hot flashes at day 6 and 7 during the afternoon and sleep. Hot feeling neck and head. Did not finish 10 day_ stopped at 7.
Vertigo_ blurry vision_ diarrhea_ gas so far.
Comments: I took this in 1988 with no problems. 7 years ago I got diagnosed with a rare tendon disease. All my tendons hurt 24/7. No cure. They tear for no reason (micro tears) MRI shows the enthesopathy in my hips_ groin_ elbows_ wrist_ shoulders etc.. DO NOT TAKE THIS IF IT CAUSES YOU PAIN !! I can't prove it but it has destroyed my life.

Side Effects: diarrhea_ nausea_ vomiting_ heart burn_ headache
Comments: Took 1 pill every 12 hrs

Side Effects: Increased coughing_ very sore wrists_ like carpal tunnel inflammation_ loose stools alternating with constipation.
Comments: Has not helped the sinus problem_ but seems to mak it worse_ especially causing a lot of coughing. Also my hands are very sore and tingling.

Side Effects: Nausea_ headaches_ anxiety_ joint pain_ heart palpitations_ muscle spasms_ heart burn_ fluttering/spasm in left side of abdomen_ fatigue_ overall ill feeling
Comments: If you can stand these side effects_ it seems like a good medicine to clear you up quickly_ luckily I only have 1 day left_ will not take again

Side Effects: Dizziness.  Head pain. Anxiety panic. Confusion    Thought that I was going crazy
Severe joint pain but not sure if related to medication_  reading other reviews feel it may. Have another 7 days of augmentin and will try and finish unless pain gets worse.
Very bad headaches_ feeling sleepy_ insomnia_ severe anxiety_ loss of appetite_ body feeling itchy.
Comments: My doctor prescribed it along with cortisone and respiratory physiotherapy because I had  the worst bronchitis I 'd ever experienced. I think the medecine helped cure me but I lost self-confidence and the side effects were very difficult to cope with. I'd say be aware of that if your relatives or friends contact you. You may appear hyper anxious and people won't necessarily be sympathetic_ thinking it's " just a bronchitis " and not knowing how strong the side effects are.Put your life on hold for a while. Avoid anything / anyone that can enhance anxiety.

Side Effects: Fatigue_ appetite loss_ nostalgia_ hoarseness_ blurred vision_ dry eyes_ leg weakness_ brain fog
Comments: I think this is an excellent drug for bacterial infections_ and it is the drug of choice for animal bites. It is very powerful and at higher doses_ such as mine_ I think some side effects are bound to occur. I didn't find them intolerable_ just kind of putting my life on hold for ten days. It sure beats being in the hospital for four days on IV antibiotics.

Side Effects: Severe anxiety_ depression (probably from the anxiety!)
Comments: About three days into it_ started to experience significant anxiety and OCD-ish symptoms; one week after finishing_ anxiety largely gone.  Went to a quick-med place that prescribed this.  Normally take Z-paks for sinusitis without this side effect.  Never had this reaction on augmentin when younger.

Side Effects: The WORST antibiotic I have ever taken. By day 3_ I was experiencing severe anxiety_ heart palpitations_ constant and irrational worrying. I had tingling and numbness in my limbs and had no appetite. By night 3_ I was unable to sleep. The next morning_ I called my Dr. and had my antibiotic changed. Once I stopped taking Augmentin I started feeling back to normal.
Yeast infection_ diarrhea_ nausea_ numbness of left side_ dizziness_ stiffness_ dizziness so bad had a hard time getting to the toilet with diarrhea. Stopped taking and will never take again
Fatigue_ dry-mouth_ unwanted feelings of anxiety_ upset_ not normal for me. Loss of appetite. Discontinued after 4 days_ making me crazy.
Comments: Never again_ this is a powerful drug.

Side Effects: Anxiety_ increased heart rate_insomnia_feeling foggy. I haven't had the stomach upset_ forced myself to eat something with. But I can't take anymore. Side effects worsening not getting better. Calling Doc in morning. Doubt they will do anything
Anxiety_ depression_ diarrhea_ cold sensation_ headache_ dizziness_ mental confusion_ drowsiness_ insomnia_ altered visual perception_ weakness_ change in breathing pattern_ heart palpitations
On the 7th day my husband developed severe joint pain in his neck and wrists and eventually moved all over his body.It hurt him to move. He also had fatigue and dry mouth.
Severe headaches_ spasms in my legs (especially kneecaps)_ lack of energy and feeling extremely sick despite eating before taking them.
diarrhea_ depression_ extreme tiredness_ mood swings
thought I was having a heart attack_ arm tingling and numb_ very anxious_ weird thoughts_ sweating
Comments: it fixed up my sinus infection quickly_ but I think they should warn you about possible side effects.  last time I took it_ for a tooth abscess_ I ended up with thrush_ so I knew to take yogurt and probiotics this time.  so far_ so good about that_ but i'm only on day 3 of 10.

Side Effects: Severe anxiety_ panic_ cloudy head_ lethargy_ joint pain_ diarrhea
Comments: I have never felt so bad as I have on this antibiotic. Almost immediately I began feeling anxious and by day 5 was so anxious_ paranoid_ and panicking that I could hardly function. I have taken augmentin before but have heard that one can develop hypersensitivity to it later on.  Also had upset stomach the whole time even though I ate each time I took it (despite having no appetite) and joint pain that grew worse each day_ especially in my shoulder_ jaw_ and knee. Never taking this medicine again!

Side Effects: Upset stomach_ nervous feeling_ mood swings_ and loose stools. The loose stools resulted in hemorrhoids_ which I had to get additional meds for. WORST PAIN with bowel movements that I have ever experienced.
Chest pain_ dead arm
Comments: Very scary_ almost went to hospital for the chest. Only took 3 tabs cause I can't continue. Dead arm freaking me out. Didn't know I had any drug allergies but the drug combined with the amoxicillin did me no good. Hope these symptoms clear.

Side Effects: Hives_ swelling of my hands and feet if I got cold_ and severe joint pain that lasted 3 weeks_ and had hair loss for months afterward.
Comments: Would never recommend this except as a last resort. The joint pain was really harsh and faded very gradually over the 3 weeks after I stopped taking the drug. I lost a great deal of hair that didn't start growing back until about 5 months after I stopped taking the drug. I don't even want to imagine what may have happened if I had taken this drug through it's full coarse.

Side Effects: Where to begin?  Hives_ itching_ dizziness_ faint feeling_ cloudy head_ drugged-feeling_ anxiety_ depression_ reflux_ heavy/weak limbs_ extreme fatigue.Ended 10-day course 2 days early_ today.  Fought a 3-month urinary tract infection (post hysterectomy w/catheter) with five rounds of antibiotics before a culture was finally done and determined I had a drug resistant form of E Coli causing the UTI.  The side effects have been so horrible and the UTI pain still exists so I discontinued med.  Should know tomorrow results of recheck culture but expect it to be positive due to continued burning.  Doctor said he already alerted Infectious Disease dept immediately after first culture to prepare for possible IV treatments.  This drug was only a hit or miss antibiotic for this strain of E Coli bacteria.  (Note:  mfg is Sandoz_ 875/125_ 2 x daily)

been feeling unusually tired_ sluggish_ depressed and having mood swings. It didn't occur to me that it might be the drugs! Now that i know why i feel so terrible i've found some relief and will contine my 5 to 10 day course. it's working for it's intended purpose
intermittent headache_ sleepiness_ minor joint pain and increased heart rate (temporary) lasting less than an hour.
Comments: I did take probiotics with every dose and experienced no stomach upset/issues but the sleepiness is a major drag.  Drink a LOT of water with this drug to dilute it.

Side Effects: Diarrhea_ then constipation!_ muscle soreness_ joint pain_ anxiety_ vaginal yeast infection_ thrush in mouth
Comments: Make sure you take this with food_ otherwise you will have diarrhea. HOWEVER_ I had been taking a supposedly good probiotic_ and was having diarrhea so bad I was pooping my pants. Thought it was the Augmentin_ but when I stopped taking the probiotic_ the diarrhea stopped. Was eating Chobani yogurt with every meal (add 4 Equal if you like sweeter yogurt)_ and then actually got constipated. Had not pooped in a solid week_ and had to go to ER for enema. My muscles and joints are killing me. Thought it might be the infection_ but lots of others are reporting this. This is the WORST antibiotic I have ever taken_ but the Clavanate Potassium part is supposed to help resistant infections. Was in hospital on IV Vancomycin and Ampicillin (the IV form of Augmentin)_ and released on this oral form. Infection is better_ but feel like I've been run over by a truck!

Side Effects: Severe coughing_ mood swings_ difficulty breathing_ nausea_ depression.
I have upset stomac_ joint pains_ insomnia_ feel feverish but no fever. I was told to take for 10 days but I'm thinking of stopping_ I feel owful

Severe joint (hip) pain.   Never had any troubles with my hips in my life.  Pain has been so severe I felt sick.  On the 9th day started with neck_ shoulder and back pain.  Hopefully if I discontinue this it will stop.  Will never take this drug again.
A little bit of nausea if taken after food_ i found taking them just before eating helped alot! depression_ mood swings.
The worst vomiting and diarrhea I have ever had for 5 hours straight probably should have gone to hospital but couldn't move this was within 2 hours of taking 1 pill - never again
Severe stomache pain and vomitting. Sick as a dog. Had to go to ER.
Comments: AMOXICILLIAN IS WAAAAAAAAAY Better and safer when its not cut with other chemichals.

Side Effects: Joint pain_ muscle soreness_ stiff_ aching joints
Comments: Took the generic form Sandoz.. Augmentin made me crawl to the doctor's office the day after Christmas. After 3 short days (3 pills)_ I am now recovering from the most pain I have ever felt on my life. I have been prescribed steroids_ pain pills_ and muscle relaxers (more meds) to treat the horrendous side effects from a med. What sense does that make? Still can't bend my back_ still can't walk upright_ 8 days later...Anybody out there suing Sandoz?

Side Effects: I am on Paxil for Panic Attacks but had not had one in over 3 years.  On day 3 of taking this med I had a severe panic attack and have felt on the verge of one for the next 2 days.  I'm stopping the Augmentin and never taking it again.  Severe diahrrea and nausea too -- because of this I got dehydrated.  This has been an awful experience!
Nausea loose motions dryness of mouth and vagina headache vaginal yeast infection
Dizzyness_ Loose stools_ upset stomach and Vaginal Yeast Infection
Comments: It cause me YEAST INFECTION! Terrible medicine!!

Side Effects: Side effects_  panic attacks_ anxiety_ depression_ nausea_ diarrhea_ tiredness_ dizziness.
Comments: The side effects started 2 days into taking the medication.  Panic attacks_ anxiety_ depression by day 4 severe nausea and moderate  diarrhea.  It is now 3 days after I have finished the 5 day course and I am extremely dizzy_ tired_ anxious_ still nauseous and have light diarrhea.  Hoping this subsides very soon as I cannot even think about work.

Side Effects: Diarrhea_ Nausea_ Depression_ Anxiety.
Comments: I have had to start taking an anti-depressant as I thought I was going to go crazy from the anxiety attacks I had after taking this for 7 days!!!  Thankfully my sister also has started taking this medication and is experiencing the same side effects.  And funny enough after 4 days of stopping Augmentin_ my anxiety has gone.  Knowing that Zoloft takes 2 - 3 weeks to work_ I am fully convinced that it was the Augmentin that made me feel the worst anxiety in my life.  I also had Diarrhea and no appetite whatsoever.  Never in my life have I suffered from such appetite suppression as I have on this medication.  I feel like these Augmentin poisened me and would say to anyone who is sensitive to medication and prone to anxiety - Beware!!!

Side Effects: I've been on for 7 days. Depression_ irritability_ TAKE WITH FOOD. I puked the whole day when I attempted to delay eating with it. Pretty sure I have a yeast infection at this point
Comments: Otherwise_ it's not THAT bad. It is after all an antibiotic and a large dose. There haven't been any side effects that aren't pretty normal. Suggestion: take probiotics with it.

Side Effects: Fourth day into the course_ I started feeling wicked headaches. Today_ day five_ I had one of the worst migraines I remember having. My doctor thinks Augmentin is not to blame_ but toxins of the dying bacteria in my lungs.I have taken Augmentin Duo Forte a few times; other than this time_ I had no apparent side effects.
Comments: From the start of the course_ my fever disappeared and my body temperature decreased from 40.1 degrees centegrade (104.2 F) to 37 degrees centegrade (98.6 F).I think this antibiotic should not be the first choice for minor infections_ such as strep throat (as many users on this page)_ but it did wonders for my pneumonia.

Side Effects: insomnia_ dry mouth_ heavy limbs...
Comments: feelings of anxiousness_ depression

Side Effects: Insomnia_ very bad nausea_ stomach pain and horrible acid reflux
Comments: I will never take this medication again.  I could have probably handled some nausea and stomach pain but the acid refux it gave me was horrible.  I thought my throat would errupt into flames.  I could not take it any longer then 7 days.

Side Effects: Extreme joint pain occurred the 4th day.  Lasted for four hours almost cried it was so severe.  Faded as the medication was withdrawn. I did not take any more of it. Very frightening.

I'm on my 6th day of taking this antibiotic_ and I am feeling: Jittery_ Nausea_Loose BM_Elevated Heart rate_Lethargic_Loss of appetite_Dizziness_ Confusion_ Cloudy feeling as if under water_ Emotional_ weight loss_ mild cramping_ dry mouth_ Tingling on my left arm to my hand_ painful Urination_ and Coughing up clear phlegm.
Comments: I don't even know if this is all normal or not_ but I will give it my try to finish this ABX (4 more days to go) and HOPEFULLY all of my Infection related symptoms will cease_ if not I fear I will end up with a more severe Infection and maybe hospitalized. Still waiting for the Yeast Infection to pop up... ;/

Side Effects: chills_ feverish_ pain_ rash_ stomach pain_ diarrhea_ nausea (INTENSE)_ migraines_ tired_ pain all over body_ severe anxiety/depression.
Comments: I am currently on day 5? of Augmentin_ and I have 5 more days... UGHThis is the worst antibiotic EVER! I feel worse then I did before taking it. I am suffering right now as I type this... I don't know how I'm going to make it through another 5 days.I also ALREADY have anxiety/depression_ and my medicine for those can't even battle off the anxiety that comes with this medicine. It's horrible!

Side Effects: Immediate stomach ache several hours after taking_ even with meals.  Later in course incessant hives/ithcing all over body_ hands. Tingling lips
Comments: I have had this Abic several times and liked it as didn't get yeast infection.  Apparently it was responsible for an idiopathic hive response at the end of dosing (10 days) last spring that went on for weeks and only ended with steroid treatment.  Fexafenadiene couldn't stop it.  I thought I was reacting to contact with a snail enzyme preparation in the lab_ but now with this last reaction and checking back on the occurence_ I can link it to the augmentin.

Side Effects: Depression_ sleepiness_ anxiety.  The side effects did not hit me until day 5.  I thought I was just feeling down.  I continued the medicine_ and side effects got worse.  I stopped after day 8 and it took about 4 days for my mood to return to a normal level.  I researched the drug.  It turns out that they are doing clinical trials on clavulanic acid_ which is part of the drug.  Evidently it has had some antianxiety reactions on primates.  If a drug can produce antiaxiety reactions_ it can produce anxiety reaction also.  Look up the side effects of antianxiety medicine.  I will never take any antibiotics that are coupled with clavulanic acid unless there are no other options.
Comments: Thanks to everyone who shared their experience.  I hope if you experience adverse side effects you will share also.  I am also curious the mg of augmentin administered in clinical trials?  I bet there is some threshold that the medical community is ignoring?  500 mg 2 times a day maybe?

Side Effects: After a few days on the medication_ I began to feel extremely fatigued.  It was very difficult to move my arms and legs.  I stopped the medication_ but the symptoms continued for months.  I'm glad I found this site because I began to think I was going crazy.  Spent thousands on tests and went to multiple doctors because doctors didn't believe it was the medicine.  It's been 5 months and I'm still not 100%.
Comments: Would stay away from this antibiotic.

Side Effects: None
Comments: Augmentin XR1000 has been my only saving grace at keeping my chronic sinusitis under control. I at least can taste and smell and there is no discharge when using it as a prophylactic.Sinus surgery was unsuccessful as well as numerous other attempts such as allergy shots_ Medications that were vaporized_etc. Thousands have been spent with this condition. My fear now is that the Augmentin is losing the sinusitis war as I have just had a tube put in my left ear. Extreme Congestion is also recurring. I will continue with the sinus irrigation and hopefully find a doctor that can help.

Side Effects: Feeling very tired with nauseatic feeling.  Feverish with headache and overall lathargic feeling.  I will end my course today so I am hoping that I will feel better.  My sinusitis is better though.
Jaundice. Liver disease. Projectile vomiting. Extreme fatigue. Vertigo.
Comments: I was prescribed Augmentin in 1994 when I was 13. The first side effect that I remember was when I was kneeling on the floor getting a book out of my locker and I literally thought that my school was being turned upside down. Everything in my view suddenly flipped sideways_ I became very dizzy_ and then it flipped back again. I think that happened one more time. After I had finished taking all ten days of the meds_ I became very nauseated and began projectile vomiting. This led quickly to jaundice_ liver disease_ dozens of blood tests_ weekly+ doctor visits_ 3 months in bed and out of school_ and my weight dropping to around 78 pounds; and these are just the things I remember immediately about something that happened to me as a child_ 16 years later. Not sure if this is a coincidence_ but I didn't grow anymore after that. I would NEVER give this medication to a child or in any situation that did not already pose a threat to life or limb.

Side Effects: insomnia_ anxiety_ restlessness_ itching_ extreme blurred vision which I still have after being off for a week. My brain feels off. Memory loss and just feeling wacky. Also a vaginal yeast infection although I take a lot of probiotics.
Comments: It did clear up the infection_ but it is a wicked drug.

Side Effects: The works .... Hot sweats .. Severe headaches joint pain exhaustion
Comments: Hey just thought I'd share my experience was taking this drug for sinus infection like most people experienced severe headaches . Joint pain. Back pain .._ dizziness. Loss of appetite etc etc . Within the second day I couldn't get out of bed due to feeling so yuck thought screw it I'm gonna go cook a massive meal ... Even though I struggled to eat ... I had fruit rice steak bread etc within 1 hour I was feeling so much better and was able to sleep ..... So I just started doing that procedure throughout the 5 day course of taking 2 tablets a day ... I ate ... Then ate ... Ate ate and ate ....... I made sure I was always eating good sized meals and I drank 3 litres of water a day and let me tell you it worked ..... I had still had side effects but they were no were near as powerful from the first couple days ........ At times I would literally have to force the food down my mouth with alot of water and it worked good ....... You won't feel like eating at all but .. Force at least 3 meals a day not snacks but proper portioned meals ._... And add all you can ... Eggs steak bread vegetables fruit and WATER ... Hope that helps

Side Effects: Nausea_ anorexia_ dehydration_ severe indigestion_ bloating_ abdominal pains_ severe joint pains.
Comments: I was prescribed augmentin 15 days post op as I collapsed with rigors. I took it religiously but spent virtually all day in bed for a week with nausea and little energy due to not eating or drinking. The joint pains started on the 2nd day. At first I thought they were due to a bacteraemia. They became so severe that I could barely walk. My doctor prescribed dihydrocodeine. I finished the Augmentin 2 days ago and my joints are so much better.

Side Effects: diarrhea (even after taking with food); stomach pain; nausea; joint/tendon pain in legs_ foot_ and elbow; constant fatigue; insomnia; yeast infections that began after 3 days and continued for the entire 6 wks plus another 3 after I finished the course (OBGYN prescribed Diflucan during the 6wk course to treat and prevent yeast infections_ but it had no effect at all)
Comments: I will NEVER EVER take this medication again. I had been on Keflex before for a similar problem and thought that was horrible_ so the doctor substituted Augmentin. 9 weeks of constant yeast infections and tendon pain are more than I intend to endure again. The tendon pain is still around 5 months after finishing the dosage. They sent me to a physical therapist for the tendon pain_ which they were unable to diagnosis_ but to no avail. I blame the Augmentin because I had not pain or previous injuries to the affected tendons before taking the drug. The side effects were way worse than my original sinus infection symptoms. As someone previous said_ I would rather DIE than take this drug again.

Side Effects: Horrible joint and muscle pain_ pouring with sweat_ very blurred eyesight_ constant breathlessness_ exhaustion_ can hardly walk. Feel terrible. The infection has got worse_ so all this agony is for nothing. Am_ stopping the Augmetin and just hope that these effects won't last too long_ but am afraid they may_ as had previously been poisoned by a fluyoroquinolone antibiotic.
Comments: Will never take it again. I'd rather die.

Side Effects: Horrible side effects!I was prescribed this after having been sick for 2 months with severe sore throat_severe cough_fever_congested chest_ear infection_etc.I was given azithromax first_which caused numb feet/hands after first day_was switched to Augmentin_which had crazy side effects.I ate yogurt and probiotics every day_and ate it with a meal_but still had horrible headaches_burning skin_sensitivity to sun_looser stools_what feels like lymph swelling(skin still tender 2 WEEKS after being off it)_body aching(and still does)_painful itch/burn around girly parts and when having bm.Also_my heart pounded while on this stuff_had heartburn all the way into throat_stomach pain_pain wrapping all the way from abdomen around to back_really unpleasant.Not fun_this medication seems to have cured what I had in some ways_but caused other problems that I am still having.My skin still burns_ hurts and feels tender_and I really hope that goes away.
Comments: Only take this if you have a REALLY tough stomach_and are desperate to get rid of an infection-be really good about probiotics daily_they help with stomach side effects.I would never give this to a child.

Side Effects: Hives_ very bad headaches_ thrush on my tounge_ and emotional
Comments: Only on my 4th day and I cant take it! I had two teeth pulled and a sinus closure. This stuff is really strong. Not having the bathroom issues so I guess thats good. I have never experienced headaches like this before and its 20 min after I take the pill (Its NOT from the procedure I had otherwise it would be constant)

Side Effects: extreme diarrhea_ nausea_ dehydration; developed C.Diff infection; nearly died.
Comments: Easily THE worst antibiotic I've ever taken; it nearly killed me.  I was put on it after a course of Cipro didn't clear up the UTI I'd been fighting for nearly 2 weeks.  Within days_ I was vomiting_ blacking out_ serious runny diarrhea_ even WITH food.  I was rushed to the hospital after 5 days on the medication and was admitted due to extreme dehydration and non-stop diarrhea.  I developed C.Diff (a life-threatening infection of the colon due to the good bacteria in the digestive tract either dead or injured by excessive doses of antibiotics; often leads to septic shock) and came VERY close to dying before the doctors were able to turn everything around.  Truly one of the scariest medications I've ever taken.

Side Effects: itching_ rash_ bloating_ nausea_ face swelling_ jaundice_ pain in upper abdomen_ weight loss_ loss of appetite
Comments: These symptoms appearing within a day or two of the end of the course of Augmentin - horrible itching_ feel tired all the time due to lack of sleep_ yellow skin and sclera_ bloating_ nausea... the list goes on and on. The symptoms do not ease over time. Now it appears there is liver damage due to this antibiotic. Testing starts today to determine the damage. Augmentin should be banned from use.

Side Effects: horrible depression_ fogginess_ nausea

At close to the fourth dose (day two of a seven day cycle) I experienced ten hours of severe diarrhea_ followed by gas.  The gas has continued and I am now on day five.  I think either I got used to the medication or the constant eating of Nancy's yogurt and added probiotics has helped.
Comments: This drug was given to me as a precaution against infection.  As I have not had evidence of infection_ my wound was either cleaned very well or the Augmentin worked.  If necessary I will take this drug again.

Side Effects: My 16 YO daughter was prescribed this med for 10 days but we stopped after 7.  Her cramps were so bad one day she was hunched over in pain and laid down on the floor at a school function. I had her eat food with the meds thinking it would cut down on the side effects but no success. Today is the 5th day after she stopped taking this medication and she is still getting severe abdominal cramps_ lightheadness and fatigue.  I called the MD and he said to start her on probiotics_ to date no improvement.  I am planning on taking her in tomorrow.  My daughter is normally very active and now in her spare time all she wants to do is sleep.  Do not allow this med to be administered to your child.
two yeast infections_ depression and anxiety
Comments: I took one 10 day course and it only somewhat helped my symptoms so I had to take a second 10 day course.

Side Effects: Explosive diarrhea on the second day (did not take with enough food). Occasional upper abdominal pain that would subside after lying down. Some anxiety starting around day 7-8. Fatigue. Slight nausea.
Comments: Took a few days to clear up my infection_ but after about day 5_ I stopped coughing and spitting up yellow mucous. I just finished my 10th day_ and am no longer coughing. The positives definitely outweighed the negatives for me. If you are experiencing stomach pain_ diarrhea_ or nausea_ I suggest taking your antibiotic with a LARGE meal (I usually just heated up a lean cuisine). Also_ it helped with I took the antibiotic at the BEGINNING of the meal_ not the end. This way_ the antibiotic gets absorbed at the same time as your stomach is digesting food_ so you stomach will feel the effects from absorption less.

Side Effects: You are supposed to take this with food_ otherwise the side effect is diarrhea.  Even taken with food_ I had so much gas and frequent bowel movements.  It wasn't diarrhea_ but stool was very loose.  But the gas was the worst part.  I was passing gas for hours after taking the medication_ and because it's to be taken twice a day_ it felt like the whole day.  It was very embarassing at work as I was constantly leaving my desk.
Comments: Medicine works.  but the side effect is very harsh considering the minor infection it cures.

Side Effects: I was suppose to take this 10 das.  Starting waking with a burning stomach.  This triggered ulcers and totally screwed up GI.  It is 2 wks later and going for my EGD tomorrow.  Had an ER visit this past wkend not sure where this horror will end.  I will never take antibiotics again!

Fatigue/exhaustion_ back and leg pain_ stiff joints_ foggy head_ feeling of "going to pass out"_ loss of appetite_ ringing in ears_ stomach discomfort_ GERD aggravation_ insomnia_ anxiety and agitation.  Runny nose_ cough and vaginal discharge related to increased secretion production. Also_ feeling of inability to get warm.  I ALWAYS take probiotics and use kefir which keeps diarrhea under control. Take these an hour before or 2 after ANY antibiotic for best results.  Am on day 7 of 10 day course.
Comments: This is nasty stuff.  My infection did clear thus far_ however_ the side effects are difficult to deal with.  I have Fibromyalgia and this med triggered a horrible flair up.  Many of my symptoms are "fibro like" and it is difficult to differentiate between fibro and side effects except side effects are more intense then a normal fibro flair.  FIBRO PATIENTS BEWARE!

Side Effects: I experienced the usual diarrhea that comes when on an antibiotic_ feeling very tired_ which I thought at first was from the Darvacet pain medication_ but after discontinuing the pain meds I still remained very lethargic. It wasn't until the 6th day when I woke up in the middle of the night with excruciating pain in my knee joints_ wrist and shoulders_ also my throat felt sore. The pain in my knees was so intense that I could barely walk_ which scared me. I have taken this medication before and never had any problems.  But after talking to my doctor she said that I have developed a hypersensitivity to the drug and that in some cases a person could have taken this in the past and than all of the sudden have this type of reaction to the medication.  So I discontinued the Augmentin_and because the joint pain was so severe_ my doctor put me on Oxycotin pain meds. I was told that the joint pain should subside within a of couple weeks_ I'm hoping for sooner!!I
severe muscle weakness in arms_ anxiety_ sweats_mild stomach pain and mild acid reflux
Comments: 2000 mg twice daily. The size of the dose scares me_ but the clinical picture is that of pneumococcal infection_ so I'd rather take this than have an URTI spread to my lungs.I'm taking a good probiotic so have not experienced any intestinal discomfort.It's only been prescribed for 5 days so I hope and pray that I won't experience severe side-effects.The sinus pains and headaches I had had for three days cleared up about 8 hours after taking the first dosage.

Side Effects: mild anxiety_ fatigue. diarrhea.
Comments: It's been 4 days_ and I am exhausted all of the time. I have not been to work since I started the medication. I'm anxious_ can't relax_ and tired. I usually work out 6 days a week_ but I've been on the sidelines ever since I started.

Side Effects: No major side effects...the first few day I was a little tired and down. Wouldn't call it depression just fatigued.  I'm now on 8 day of 10 day dose...2000 mg twice a day.  I think that me eating a full non greasy meal helped with not getting loose bowels. I have a little lower back pain at the moment...not sure if it's from new shoes from a pre-existing condition. All in all I'm am satisfied with my doctors decision to put me on this medication being that I am hard to treat and very sensitive to alot of Rx drugs. I have two days left on this medication...I'll keep you posted if anything changes.  The best to all!
Lightheaded_ burning tingling sensation in my face and hands_ some nausea (mainly in the AM and evening). haven't had the runs yet.
Comments: Hope it all gets better for my (and our) sake.

Side Effects: All over body rash and swelling after a few days of taking medication.  This was back in 1988-1989 and I was a senior in h.s.  My doctor diagnosed my rash as being measals and advised me to finish the antibiotic.  It wasn't until a year later when I came down with tonsilitis again and was prescribed the same medication that I realized I was allergic to amoxicilin.  At age 25 I was diagnosed with Multiple Sclerosis and there isn't a day that goes by that I don't wonder if this allergic reaction with continued use caused my system to backfire.My theory on medications now is_ God never intended it to go inside of our bodies.  It is foreign and the varied side effects we suffer through with all RX drugs is our body's way of telling us not to do it.
Diarhea_ nausea_ fatigue_ confusion_ depression_ high anxiety
Comments: I have never had any medical history of depression or the like_ but this stuff makes me feel like I'm going crazy. I'm unable to function in public and suffer from constant stomach/intestinal pain. The pharmacist said to take it with food_ but because of the drug I have no appetite. I will never take this awful drug again unless I have no other choice. It destroys your quality of life to such a point that I'd rather take a weaker med and be sick longer.

Side Effects: tired_ no labido_  severe diarreaha_  stomach cramps_ spotting and yeast infection
Comments: Stopped taking it after 6 days because I started to  experience severe diareaha. On the fourth day I got a yeast infection.  I'll never take this medicine again.

Side Effects: Yeast infection after 7days on 10 day regime
Comments: I always took this with a hearty meal i.e. carbs and fat_ so no upset stomach. The yeast infection started on day 6/7 and i got a cream to treat it. Earache went away after day 2. Headach went away after first pill. I still have congestion but on another medication to treat it. Would give 3.5 based on 5 point scale.

Side Effects: Stomach cramps; constipation; heartburn
Comments: Two times per day regimen - felt like it started working on day 3_ so ear feels much better.  Stomach cramps can be severe and woke me.  Feel like have to have bm_ but no success.  Will begin probiotics.

Side Effects: diarrhea_ extreme fatigue_ loss of appetite_ rash_ general groinal itch_ loss of libido
Comments: diarrhea from this stuff gave me a hemorrhoid. haven't been able to do anything for about 2 weeks - friends say i'm on my 'death bed.' lost 10 lbs in 10 days (a silver lining) from loss of appetite: eating is impossible. developed small rash on back on day 5. male equiv of yeast infection on day 7_ and - between loss of energy_ itchiness_ and general misery_ absolutely no libido. i hate this drug and would advise anyone to take zithromax instead when possible. stopping today after 7/10 days that proceeded 2 days of cephalex.

Side Effects: I had slightly loose stool.  Main issues were extreme fatigue and anxiety.  Moodiness_ Depression and joint pains.
Comments: I have been on Amoxicillin before_ as well as other Penicillin antibiotics and other families of antibiotic with no ill effects.  In my life_ I have never experienced the level of anxiety and depression I have while on this medicine.  I would feel depressed to the level of tears one second and afraid or angry the very next second with no outside stimulus to cause it.  These symptoms took several days to initially surface and disappeared a few days after finishing my medicine.  it did clear the infection_ but I wonder if the internal cost was too high.  I am sure a different antibiotic would have sufficed.  I am definitely informing the doctor of these effects and will avoid this medicine unless it is a matter of life and death.

Side Effects: After 6 days I broke out in a rash all over my torso. I also am itching all over and am lightheaded and irritable. I will never use this again!
Diarrhea after one day of taking 2_000 mg.per day. Diarrhea more or less controlled by taking loperamide hydrochloride.
Comments: Better diarrhea than losing my arm!

Side Effects: Extreme muscle/joint pain in arms_ shoulders and upper back_ from shoulder to shoulder.  I discontinued after 10 days and still have no relief.  Started prescription 5/20/09_ stopped 5/30 and as of today 6/6/09_ the pain continues.

After taking Augmentin XR for 7 days_ I broke out in hives on my arms_ legs and scalp.  Two days after stopping medication - I began to experience severe muscle and joint pain especially in my wrists and arms.  I actually thought my wrist was broken except I knew there had been no injury!
Comments: I've taken Augmentin before with no side effects - however this time the dosage was much higher.

Side Effects: ANXIETY_ depression_ fatigue but inability to sleep_ JOINT PAIN_ tingling in hands_ night sweats_ mouth sore_ rash on spine_ stomach cramps_ LOWER BACK/KIDNEY PAIN_ moderate to severe intestinal burning_ URETER/bladder PAIN_ mild diarrhea_ dizziness_ feeling of detachment_ I GOT THE WORKS!
Comments: Was prescribed Augmentin to prevent any post-surgery infection. I started 1 day prior to surgery. I was on pain killers for the first couple days post-op so am unsure of onset of some of the side effects. Immediately post-op I had EXTREMELY SEVERE ANXIETY! The other problems started 4-5 days after starting.  I completed the 10 day cycle_ BARELY. I should have stopped earlier. Today is my 3rd day off & still dealing with lower-back/intestinal/ureter/bladder pain_ fatigue. WILL NEVER TAKE AGAIN. I'm making sure it goes on my record as an ALLERGY.  AVOID if you can.

Side Effects: No side effects!  I usually get nauseous with antibiotics_ but I didn't feel anything on Augmentin XR.
Comments: After reading comments on this site I was nervous about the side effects_ but I had a really positive experience with Augmentin XR.  The only complaint I have is that my infection (which is still unidentified even after two strep tests_ mono test_ and a CBC) came back while I was still on Augmentin (I was good for 5 days).  I now get to have a tonsilectomy_ but that is beside the point here.  Side effects depend on the person_ what is being treated_ and probably the age of the person.  I like this medicine!

Side Effects: WORST HEADACHE OF MY LIFE_ literally never ending_ had it for a week over revision and cant think straight_ feels like my head is full of mist.. i am also excessively tired and find it impossible to wake from sleeping. pains in my face and neck alongside the headache. Had one day of intense nausea when i first started the pack
Comments: would rather have a chest infection - seriously.

Side Effects: I have taken this drug many times over the years with awful diarrhoea each time - but not this time. I think it is because I have religiously eaten probiotic yoghurt each day.
Comments: Unfortunately I have had to take three tablets daily of Duo Forte_ 875mg for over 6 weeks now_ but I have tolerated it with no side effects. It usually works quickly_ in a few days.

Side Effects: Headache_ drowsiness_ lethargy.I don't normally get headaches and I am normally in a good mood.  I am getting a severe headache within 20 minutes of taking the augmentin and it makes me slightly depressed.
Extreme fatigue_ and severe muscle pain and weakness in the legs.The expense of this antibiotic is high_ but I am asking the doctor today if I can stop it and get something else.
Comments: I will never take this again

Side Effects: severe cramping abd.pain_bloody diarrhea_vomiting
Comments: will never ever take it again

Side Effects: Heavy blood flow from period for 13 days (usually 5 days start- finish). On day 11-13 I was losing so much blood_ about 3-4 times the amount on the heaviest day of a normal period_ and I was feeling faint so I stopped Augmentin. Blood flow stopped. Also_ joint pain started in my left hand and shoulder which still continues.

My 14 year daughter had severe diarrhea (despite taking a probiotic)_ extreme upper stomach pain_ reflux_ dizziness_ no appetite.  Although this medicine cleared up her sinus infection_ I would NEVER recommend using it.  Because of the problems_ we stopped the medicine after 10 days (docs wanted her to take it 14).  Due to the severe pain_ my daughter missed 16 days of school_ had 3 pediatrician visits_ 1 ER visit_ 2 pediatric GI visits_ and 1 endoscopy (which showed inflammation in the small intestine)! I will never let any of my children use this medicine!
Diarrhea_stomach cramp_muscle weakness_blood and mucus in my stool_lower back pain.
Comments: Its been more than a year I am still suffering lower back pain so I would never recommend taking this medicine.

Side Effects: Some weakness and drowsiness.
Comments: Knocked the infection right outa me_ and it was a nasty one which nearly killed me. Take on a full stomach_ and supplement with acidophilus. As with all antibiotics_ please use your entire prescription.

Side Effects: Some intestinal bloating_ which I balanced with probiotics.

I took this for a sinus infection.  The symptoms started about 4 days into taking this stuff.  Insomnia and everytime I took a dose my heart started throbbing.  It gave me severe anxiety_ felt like I couldn't catch my breath.  I ended up going to the emergency room for a couple of anxiety attacks.  I stopped taking the medicine after 11 days.  I took this medicine to clear up one problem just so it could create another.
Comments: It cleared up my sinus infection but I won't take this again.

Side Effects: Loose stools. This was improved if I took dose with a full meal rather than a snack.
Vomitting and Diarrhea. Having been prescribed this a few times I have had this side effect about half the time.  Doesn't always happen.

Vomiting_ Diarrhea_ stomach pain_ mild rash. After 4 doses experienced these symptoms. My doctor stopped the medicine  yesterday and  am still feel nauseated today and have diarrhea and no appetite. I have never had a reaction to an antibiotic or any other medication.  My sinus is better but not worth the side effects.
Diarrhea_ nausea_ depression_ anxiety
Comments: Will not take again

Side Effects: Normal side effects like diarrhea however I can handle that  no big deal.  However it caused me behavioral changes such as depression_ anxiety_ irritability etc. I would definitely not recommend this for people in high stress environments or even for people with young children who have the tendency to push your buttons from time to time.  Having patience with your screaming child is difficult enough as it is and the behavioral side effects from Augmentin did not help.
Comments: I took this for bronchitis. Symptoms went a way after a few weeks_ but it was not worth the price.  Normally my screaming kids dont really bother me (I have a two year old and a 1 year old) however while on augmentin I found myself anxious_ drepessed and really up-tight.  Ill never take it again because I yelled at my kids a few times which is something ive never done prior to taking Augmentin.

Side Effects: major joint pain and diarrhea; stomach cramps
Comments: Thank God for this site! I've never had side effects from drugs before so I thought I had fibromyalgia! I'm fearful of antibiotic resistance so I was determined to just see it through on this drug but now that I see the joint pain could be from the drug there is no way I am taking one more pill ever again. Plus_ my ear is still infected!

Side Effects: Diarrhea.
Comments: I started taking Augmentin 4 days ago.  Yesterday I started having diarrhea_ and it's continuing today.  I have to take it for at least 6 more days.  So far I don't have any other reactions.

Side Effects: I was feeling a sore throat for a few days. Upon taking this i immediately felt better inthe throat the next day. but gradually during the course i have begun having horrible body aches and anxiety. other than that i am well. I have been off the antibiotics for 2 days and the pains have yet to subside. Also i did get a clouded feeling while on it. Ive never had a reaction on antibiotics like this. Its horrible. I did kick the infection but at a steep price. I would not recommend this one if you can avoid it.
headache_ dizziness and feeling 'foggy' in the head.  Upset stomach_ thrush_ intense aching in my upper arms leading to tendon pain.  Severe anxiety.
Comments: I took a 10 day course of this drug.  The 'foggy' feeling in the head continued for sometime afterwards.  Thrush started the day I finished the course.  The following day I experienced sudden_ intense aching in both my upper arms_ that by the next day had resulted in severe tendon pain requiring weeks of treatment. Several days after finishing the course I began to experience severe anxiety which has continued some 2 months later.  I would like to hear from anyone with similar experiences_ particularly the anxiety problem.  Can't seem to get anyone in the medical profession to consider it might be the drugs.

Side Effects: I had drowsiness_ headaches_ dizzy_ confused_ lightheaded feelings_ stomach discomfort_ appetite completely went_ diarrhoea_ sore stomach
Comments: I was given this drug for a possible gum infection by A&E at the hospital_ I have taken a few antibiotics but I have never in all my life have felt as bad as on this.  It felt like it took over my body totally and it was a very scary experience my doctors denied it which made me feel even worse saying that I was prescribed this medicine in 2002.  I have had penicillin before but didn't know if it was the second ingredient my body didn't like even coming off it it took a while to get back to normal very scary.  Would like to hear from others experiences by email

Side Effects: Similar to other peoples on here_ really bad headaches_ dizziness_ nausea_ diahrea_ terrible night sweats_ generally feeling run down and really bad dry skin on my face.
Comments: This drug is horrendous_  have been taking it for 4 days now (3 more to go!) the past 2 days i have had off work i don't feel like i can leave the house! It did work clearing up my abscess in 24 hours though but its not worth all this greif.

Side Effects: After 3 days of taking 625mg Augmenting every 8 Hours_ I've experienced severe stomack pains _ cramps _ nausea and sever bloody diarrhoea and after 36 Hours had to call an ambulance and admitted into A&E with severe dehydration and mineral disbalance_ not mentioning anemia.Had stopped Augmentin immediately after the symptoms occured but still had to stay in the hospital for 5 days due to the severity of the bleeding.
Comments: Avoid if possible as it has attacked my digestive mucosa without me having any pre-existent digestive conditions .

Side Effects: I experienced stomache cramp while taking this medication_ which has begun to get worse_ 2 days after finishing the medication.
Comments: I am wondering if it's possible for this medication to cause stomach cramping days after finishing the medication.  My stomach cramps are worse now.

Side Effects: overall muscle weakness_ severe leg weakness_ falling
Comments: stopped taking after the second day and actually fell out of bed

Side Effects: Horrible Diahrea_cramping_skin peeling_vagainal itching and peeling to back area_cramps no sleep_dizzy_burning_massive upset stomach
Comments: I will never take this stuff again it has made it to where i can not get out of the house it burns so badly i have been taking it for 6 days and it hasd been the worse 6 days ever do not take this stuff it is perscribed for 10 days but i do not care the cost of this stuff it is going in the trash and never again will this be in my house

Side Effects: after taking for 14 days_developed acid reflux and severe anxiety_which neither one i have ever had.can anyone tell how long until these symptoms are gone.i am on meds for both problems.this is affecting my entire life.i will never take this medicine again.
crazy diarrhea
Comments: worth it because it knocked out the sinus pain in 24 hours.  6 days left.

Side Effects: No explosive diarrhea_ but all my silver jewelry tarnished. What the hell? :/ i had to go buy silver jewelry cleaner. I also had to pee about every half hour starting around the fifth day.
Depression.
Comments: I had taken this drug for a year on and off for a bad infection in my jaw and had no side effects. I took it for a sinus infection years later and it caused depression so I stopped.

Side Effects: Initially none_ then after first course of 10 days_ inability to settle down and sleep_ extreme weepiness and anxiety.
Comments: Prescribed for my 12 year old son who had two infected sinuses. This knocked him for a loop. After 10 days on the drug he couldn't sleep and drove us crazy with anxious fears at bedtime. I think this is a drug of last resort for someone like my son. But you won't know until you try it.:(

Side Effects: jOINT PAIN & YEAST INFECTION VAGINAL ITCHING AND BURNING
Comments: NOT AS BAD AS I THOUGHT IT WOULD BE. I AM VERY SENSITVE TO MOST ANTIBIOTICS AND THIS IS A STRONG ONE . I COULD HAVE LIVED WITH OUT THE YEAST INFECTION THOUGH

Side Effects: I am adding to my first post . . . I had horrible side effects from Augmentin.  My hives are finally gone after two months.  I peeled head to toe.  That's stopped now.  However_ I have bad joint pain now in my right hand.  I can't open bottle tops sometimes because of the pain!  I hope this goes away as well.  Anyone still got joint pain after months?
Nausea_ vomiting_ severe stomach cramps_ diarrhea was so severe that I couldn't get out of my bed.
Comments: This was the worst antibiotics i've ever taken.

Side Effects: First week_ as suspected cramping and stomach issues- but after 2 weeks and through the 6 week course severe muscle and joint pain. It's been 10 days and this hasn't subsided. Another CT scan will show if the infection is totally gone.
nothing really; light flareup of existing lung issue_ no biggie.
Comments: Switched to this after a bad bout of side effects with Cipro. While this has a longer run (14 days vs. 3 days)_ I'm much happier.

Side Effects: SEVERE yeast infection_ spreading to my thigh_ almost down to my knees_ and around to my butt. anxiety_ nausea_ loose stools_ also seems to make me drowsy.
Comments: got rid of my strep throat in like minutes.

Side Effects: None.
Comments: Within 18 hours I was feeling much better.  No reaction (diarrhea_ nausea_ or skin rashes) at all.  Much better than the previous antibiotics that had tried and failed to alleviate the infection.

Side Effects: I havent had any side effects except to be feeling 100% better!! I have taken it for 4 days now and have 6 left to go. Great med!
Comments: The cost of this medicine is very high but worth it due to how quickly it works. I had read this webpage before taking the medicine and was very worried about side effects but so far none. I am eating before I take the pill and also eating yogurt to prevent digestive problems.

Side Effects: Constant watery diarrhea_ can't leave the house while on this stuff.
Comments: This is the WORST antibiotic I've ever taken. I've never had a reaction to antibiotics. I would not recommend this med to anyone.

Side Effects: Started feeling better quickly.
Comments: This stuff is incredible.  Knocked out a sinus infection that resisted previous treatment.  I had no side effects whatsoever and I think that this is a miracle drug.

Side Effects: Some diarea_ but i know i have to take Nystatin_ or Acidophilus for a stomach flora
I had no side effects at all.  It just did its job.  I had seen this site before taking it_ so I was worried_ but no problems.
Severe migraine_ stomach cramps_ upset stomach_ severe skin itching_ (gerd) acid reflux_ insomnia
Comments: Discontinued at 6 days still suffering from sever skin itching and insomnia 4 days after discontinuing. Never had a problem with plain amoxicillin.

Side Effects: Diarrhea or very loose stool with mucous first 3 days_ then retruned after a few more days. Slight nausea_ dizziness
Comments: Perscribed 4000 MG a day for 10 days.I dont like this stuff. The diarreah is pretty bad and the mucous and gas that comes with it made it unnerving. I dont recommend this RX. I dont usually have side effects to antibiotics!

Side Effects: Gas_ bloating_ constipation_ a little nausea and dizziness (not sure if this symptom was assoicated heavy sinus though)and weakened bladder.
Comments: With a Chronic active autoimmune Hepatitis (in remission)_ liver damage_ I am more than cautious about taking antibiotics.  I took Amoxicillin for 1st day (taken previously for sinus_ which had sent me to emerg with severe stomach pain)_doctor recommended Augmentin & Clavulanate potassium_ 625 mg x 2 daily_ which I took for a total of 9 days. Doctor  suggested a 14 day treatment for acute sinus_ but I have difficulty with long term antibiotics due to liver damage_ and understand my bodys tolerance quite well. Besides we dont really know how much of the tooth problem could be affecting the sinus condition or visa versa_ either way_ a bad infection. After researching the drug_ I also decided on lots of plain yogurt in between doses to keep the stomach as normal as possible. Overall_ the pain has lessened and facial swelling has gone down. Tooth remains to be seen_ but told this drug would help infection in this area too.

Side Effects: Terrible diarrhea; rash/hives/itching; muscle cramps in toes/feet; sore lump/extended bruising on a finger_ though I don't know how to be certain this is a side effect_ but it is surely something I've never seen before. Also having daily migraines and insomnia_ but don't know if these are necessarily side effects of the Augmentin XR.
Comments: I am on day 6 of 10_ and I feel like the cure is worse than the illness. My yogurt-banana-rice diet (what I can tolerate with the Augmentin so hard on my system) hasn't been very satisfying_ and I feel just horrible. My sinus infection may be better_ but I don't know if it was worth how awful I feel on this antibiotic.

Side Effects: nausea_ vomiting_ severe diarrhea_ weight loss_ c diff infection_ severe stomach pain_ fatigue_ joint pain.
Comments: It is awful.  The worst antibiotic I have ever taken.  The side affects are worse than what you are taking them for.  I will NEVER take this again. Now they think I might have liver damage from such a high dose.  4000 mg a day! for 28 days. Took them for 24 days stopped almost two weeks ago and still fell just as bad if not worse than when I started.  Still have fever.  Good luck to anyone taking this med.

Side Effects: awful joint and muscle pain_ made me think something was horribly wrong_ I could barely do my job_ even though the sinus infection was under control
Comments: YES!  Others have had the joint and muscle pain_ it's not the most common side effect_ but it does happen.  So I am hoping it will go away once I finish the drug.

Side Effects: Very fast resting heart rate_ loss of appetite_ feeling nauseated_ vision blacking out when standing up too fast and then returning after 10 seconds_ diarrhea
Comments: This medicine makes me feel more sick than I expected. My heart is beating so fast within an hour of taking it I feel like I'm exercising constantly.

Side Effects: intense_ unpleasant dizziness_ loss of appetitie
Comments: i discontinued use after four days because the side effects were so unpleasant. However_ it did seem to help bring down my original fever.

Side Effects: None as of yet_ but I have taken this before and expereinced slight diarrera.  If you stay hydrated and eat regular amount of yogurt it goes a long way to helping offset the side affects.  Also_ take the drug exactly as stated with plenty of food.  I have had sinus surgery and several bouts with sinus infections.  Clearly the best advice is to not get sick in the first place_ but without this drug I would be in trouble.
Comments: Unless otherwise directed take the full course.  If you are on this drug in the first place it must be for a good reason.  This is nothing to mess around with and failing to complete the course can result in antibiotic resistent bacteria in your head.  I would add that learning about your body is key to managing reoccuring sinus infections.  I have found relief in using OTC drugs at key times makes all the difference.  If you feel your sinuses swelling and getting congested hit it hard with Ibrofen and a 12hour decongestent (Sudafed).  Since using this approach I avoided sinus infections for 2 years until this spring.

Side Effects: I had diarrhea but took a diflucan to prevent yeast infection and the diarrhea stopped immediately.  Might be coincidence but thought I should mention it.  Now I am having severe muscle cramping in feet_ legs and back.  Again could be an interaction with other meds or maybe I need to drink more water.

On day two had explosive watery diarrhea that came without warning. Have continued to have very watery diarrhea but no other apparent side effects yet. I am nursing_ and my baby has some loose stools_ but so far no explosive episodes like I did. Have had some itching around the bite_ but had that before.  Now on day 3 of 10
Comments: I was aware of the diarrhea and yeast infection side effects before taking it_ but was willing to try it to save my leg. I also had a shot of cephalosporin (sp?) antibiotic on day one as well. I was glad to hear about eating yogurt and am definately going to try this. My bite has stopped spreading and the burning and overall itch and discomfort has died down - so if this is because of the Augmentin_ I'll deal with the diarrhea. I am going to call my doctor to let him know if it persists for another day_ especially after eating yogurt.

Side Effects: The worst diareah I have ever had. I mean I could not even leave the house the get my daughter off the school bus.
Comments: The only thing that cures my chronic sinus and ear infections. Side effects are worth it.

Side Effects: Severe cramping(thought my uterine ifection was getting worse)_ nausea_watery diarrhea_ muscle aches_ anxiety. Just not feeling "Right"
Comments: I noticed improvement with my symptoms within the first 24 hours but the side effects suck. I didn't know about taking the probiotics so maybe that might have helped to have less side effects. I have 2 more days and I have already skipped a dose because of how it makes me feel. Hopefullly I will be able to hold out until the end.

Side Effects: Bloating_ Diarrhea_ head ache_ muscle aches esp in legs and chest and lower back_ weakness_ fatigue_ nausea
Comments: Well_ the coughing etc has stopped_ and my tonsils shrunk back to normal size_ but i feel like crap. I'm on day four. the side effects hit in the middle of day two_ and have been getting gradually worse. but i guess the drug completed its purpose_ im not suffering from my illness anymore_ i'm suffering because of the drug itself.

Side Effects: cramps_ diarrhea (sp?)_ gas_ yeast infection
Comments: I feel like a scene from "War of the Worlds" is waging in my intestines. There's not enough toilet paper in the house to keep up with the diarrhea_ and I don't feel much better than I did four days ago...

Side Effects: none that were noted
Comments: after a series of 5 different antibiotics from family doctor_ siusitis_ bronchitis did not improve. specialist prescribed augmentin xr 1000. took entire course of med_ to feel 90% better. a week after completing back to new. thank god for augmentin xr

Side Effects: Some gas and bloating.
Comments: Just wanted to update my previous comments on this drug.  I'm on day 8 of 10 days.  My Doctor confirmed the diagnosis of Strep Throat bacteria from the culture throat swab he took last week.  The more I use the drug the side effects don't seem as bad.  I would recommend this drug for treatment of Strep Throat and bacteria! --- It really cured me quickly !  Thanks :-)

Side Effects: Some gas and bloated stomach_ constipation.
Comments: After 5 days of horrible swollen painful tonsils and not being able to sleep or eat or drink due to intense pain when swallowing I went to the doctor and he gave me an Rx for 10-day course of Augumentin XR.... I took the first 2 pills immediately after leaving the Dr's office and my fever and sore throat subsided within 24 hours !  I was able to go back to work the next day and was able to sleep finally.  The pus on the sides of my tonsils disappeared and my voice returned to normal.  I'm on day 4 of 10 right now.  The side effects were not that bad_ only some mild gas and bloating and mild stomach cramps... I've been eating a lot of yogurt and pro-biotic drinks to replenish my intestinal friendly bacteria.

Side Effects: none
Comments: finally cleared up my chronic sinus infection!!  YAY!!

Side Effects: Severe arthritic attacks three times during three courses of Augmentin XR  This happened three times_ each after about 8 to 10 days of taking Augment XR.   Also severe diarrhea.
Comments: Extremely severe joint pain in knees_ back_ wrists_ shoulders_ hands.  I could not walk without help for a couple of days.  After many blood tests_ doctors concluded Augmentin was likely cause.  Has this happened to anyone else?

Side Effects: Moodiness and depression.
Comments: Due to the other review_ I've been lucky. I am taking 1000/62.5mg twice daily. I have to say I felt worse before I felt better. Today is day 4 of 10 and am just begining to feel better. For those first few days you felt like a war is waging inside you. Today_ I feel a lot better and some had energy. The downer is it seems to give me some depression_ it also made me start my menses a week early.

Side Effects: Increased heart rate and anxiety along with muscle cramping and spasms. I also felt strange sensations in my arms and hands.
Comments: I experienced symptoms within 1 hour of taking the medication.

Side Effects: The absolute worst bloody diarehha.  Thought my internal organs were going to come out of me one way or another.  Lost 5 lbs. so far and my intestines are still unsettled.  I can't afford to lose any more weight.  (I way 90 lbs. now}
Comments: On the 3rd day I quit taking this and called the M.D.  No other medication was perscribed.
